# Codespell ignore list for oxirs-ttl
# Technical terms and proper names that should not be flagged

# RDF/Semantic Web terms
rdf
rdfs
xsd
owl
foaf
sparql
trig
ntriples
nquads
oxigraph
jena
fuseki

# N3 specific terms
forall
forsome

# Programming terms
impl
struct
enum
async
mut
crate

# Proper names
Turi
Berners
TimBL
